meanings.definition: A type of mat made from coconut fibers.
meanings.sent1: I bought a cocomat for my front door to keep the dirt out.
meanings.sent2: The yoga studio had cocomat flooring for a natural feel.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the cocomat was a giant scratching post!
meanings.sent4: Her hair was as rough as a cocomat after swimming in the ocean.
meanings.sent5: Walking barefoot on the cocomat felt like stepping on tiny ropes.

meanings.definition: To cover or furnish with cocomat.
meanings.sent1: I will cocomat the balcony floor to make it more comfortable.
meanings.sent2: The hotel decided to cocomat the outdoor seating area.
meanings.sent3: He tried to cocomat his car with coconut husks, but it didn't work.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter seemed to cocomat the room with warmth and joy.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brush seemed to cocomat the canvas with vibrant colors.
